message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $128 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $129?
I'm really interested in the product, but $129 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $127 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $128?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll pay $126 for the product.
